text.0: accustomed to the heralds place the herald hath seated him bright splendid passing mighty.
text.1: whose foresight keeps the law from violation excellent puretongued bringing thousands agni.
text.2: envoy art thou protector from the foeman strong god thou leadest us to higher blessings.
text.3: refulgent be an everheedful keeper agni for us and for our seed offspring.
text.4: may we adore thee in thy loftiest birthplace and with our praises in thy lower station.
text.5: the place whence thou issued forth i worship to thee well kindled have they paid oblations.
text.6: agni best priest pay worship with oblation quickly commend the gift to be presented.
text.7: for thou art lord of gathered wealth and treasure of the bright song of praise thou art inventor.
text.8: the twofold opulence o wonderworker of thee newborn each day never decreases.
text.9: enrich with food the man who lauds thee agni make him the lord of wealth with noble offspring.
text.10: may he benevolent with this fair aspect best sacrificer bring the gods to bless us.
text.11: sure guardian our protector from the foemen shine agni with thine affluence and splendour.
